entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -15.6°C

Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 63 %

Dewpoint: -21.1°C

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this morning then becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 40 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
